backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no implemented logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report specifying a styling update to TryDemoSection.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing each frontend component and content file.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based style definitions using OKLCH variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point containing metadata, Open Graph tags, and script bootstrapping.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Top-level React component assembling all marketing sections into a single-page layout.
frontend/src/components/CapabilitiesSect: Renders categorized capability cards with inputs, outputs, tags, and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/ContactSection.t: Contact form that builds a mailto link and displays a success alert after submission.
frontend/src/components/FAQSection.tsx: Accordion-based FAQ list covering common questions about SentinelAI.
frontend/src/components/HeroSection.tsx: Renders the main hero section with background image, headline, description, demo button, sales contact button, and feature stats.
frontend/src/components/HowItWorksSectio: Displays the workflow steps and safe testing practices using cards with mapped content arrays.
frontend/src/components/SafetySecuritySe: Shows security features, a disclaimer, and detailed feature cards describing SentinelAI’s security practices.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Provides footer layout with branding, navigation buttons, external links, and smooth-scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Implements the sticky header with logo, navigation, scroll detection, mobile menu, and demo link.
frontend/src/components/TryDemoSection.t: Presents demo information, prompts, disclaimers, and a button linking to the demo environment.
Renders a section listing industries, their descriptions, example use cases, and tags using UI cards and icons.
frontend/src/content/capabilities.ts: Exports structured capability data describing NLP, document intelligence, and content generation features with inputs, outputs, and constraints.
frontend/src/content/howItWorks.ts: Provides workflow steps for using the demo and safe testing guidelines with titles, descriptions, and feature lists.
frontend/src/content/tryDemo.ts: Defines suggested demo prompts and a disclaimer about safe data usage in the test environment.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor based on the user's identity, refreshing related queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an authentication context for Internet Identity, handling login, identity persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets global Tailwind-based styles including theme variables, dark mode rules, accessibility focus states, and typography.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with typography, container queries, custom OKLCH color palette, extended theme settings, and animation keyframes.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s current build state, requirements, design guidelines, and feature list for a government‑grade marketing website.
